sn16.6:2.2: bhaṇḍañca → bhaṇḍuñca (bj), abhijikañca → ābhiñjikañca (bj, pts1-2, mr) | ābhijjikañca (s1-3, km)
sn16.6:5.2: yathābāle yathāmūḷhe yathāakusale → yathā bāle yathā mūḷhe yathā akusale (bj, pts1-2) | yathābālaṃ yathāmūḷhaṃ yathāakusalaṃ (?)
sn16.6:6.3: taṃ vo mayaṃ → mayaṃ accayaṃ (bj, s1-3)
